definition: variant of 長年累月|长年累月[chang2 nian2 lei3 yue4]
always/ever/often/frequently/common/general/constant
surname Chang
surname Nian
year/CL:個|个[ge4]
tired/weary/to strain/to wear out/to work hard
to accumulate/to involve or implicate (Taiwan pr. [lei4])/continuous/repeated
moon/month/monthly/CL:個|个[ge4],輪|轮[lun2]

sentences.english: Rubber is very durable which will withstand the day to day usage of the desks in the classroom environment.
sentences.chinese: 作爲學校常年累月上課使用的橡膠課桌，很耐用。

sentences.english: These are the years of traditional media have influence on people's ideology.
sentences.chinese: 這些都是常年累月傳統媒體對人們的思想產生的影響。

sentences.english: She had put the years in, and was entitled to some reward for her hard work.
sentences.chinese: 她常年累月地努力工作，理應得到一些獎勵。
